name: osu!
subtitle: rhythm is just a *click* away!
description:
An AltStore and derivatives source for the rhythm game osu!.

Source made by apix and hosted at https://apikusu.github.io/altstore.

Updated daily at 04:30 UTC.

Banner/header:
- Artist: SuperSSun (https://osu.ppy.sh/users/6972778)
- URL: https://assets.ppy.sh/user-contest-entries/15871/29b741269637b504b2a7e29745cad193d7583d7b293fc7c0e3688777d3eca2ab_opt.jpg

apps.name: osu!
apps.subtitle: A free-to-win rhythm game. Rhythm is just a *click* away!
apps.localizedDescription:
This is the future – and final – iteration of the osu! game client which marks the beginning of an open era!

Currently known by and released under the release codename "lazer". As in sharper than cutting-edge.

news.title: Project Loved: June 2025
news.caption: Bask under the sunshine and rainbows and enjoy yourself some fresh Loved picks to start up your summer!

news.title: New Featured Artist: Simon Safhalter
news.caption: Simon Safhalter slips into our Featured Artist library!

news.title: Summer Mapping Contest #2
news.caption: Summer is back, and so is the Summer Mapping Contest! 🌞

news.title: Monthly Beatmapping Contest: June 2025
news.caption: Keyboard smashers rejoice: osu!mania is getting the spotlight in this month's contest!

news.title: Community Mentorship Program Summer 2025 Signups Now Open
news.caption: The 30th cycle of the Community Mentorship Program is upon us! Get ready to delve deep into the world of mapping, modding, or storyboarding.

news.title: Featured Artist Track Updates: sugosugiii
news.caption: Whether you're playing a new tournament or just scrolling through osu!'s bespoke music list, you're probably more-than-familiar with sugosugiii, who's back with a new batch of music!

news.title: Fantasy World Art Contest
news.caption: Join us on a fantastical adventure where rhythm, art, and magic converge!

news.title: osu!(lazer) Updates: June 5, 2025
news.caption: Experts say this might be THE osu!(lazer) update of all time.
